page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: {Farming}has always played an important part in the life of the community, some farms and their buildings date back to the{1600's, although many{buildings}have been almost entirely rebuilt. Mr.Fairclough a local farmer, relates the changes in his lifetime from{mixed farming}to predominantly{arable. Barley, wheat} and{hay}are the major crops, although in the last 5 years{rape}also has become a major crop as{animal farming} has declined. With an average{farm size}of approximately 140 acres the local farms are run as a family concern having a family{workforce}of 3 or 4 full time people.
